sent.orig: For more information about grouping, see the Draw Guide.
sent.trans: 欲了解更多有关组合的信息，请参阅指南Draw指南。

sent.orig: The draw handler is then called repeatedly by each object each time a frame advances.
sent.trans: draw句柄在每一次帧刷新被每个对象重复调用。

sent.orig: He played only draw and stud.
sent.trans: 他只玩抽牌(draw)和沙蟹牌(stud)游戏。

sent.orig: Draw one nose Draw one mouth Draw two eyes Draw two ears.
sent.trans: 指向眼睛。指向鼻子，指向耳朵。指向嘴巴。

sent.orig: This draw against Napoli here at the San Paolo is certainly a good draw.
sent.trans: 在圣保罗球场与那不勒斯战平，这无疑是个好的结果。
